name: Planet Cave
description:
Planet Cave - [IMPORTANT]: I think the physics in the web version gets wonky sometimes and you get stuck sliding on some surfaces. I recommend you download the game if you have these issues.

A platformer game about jumping to reach the surface. The catch being that you can only jump in one direction (right) in this circular world, and any falls could mean the loss of a significant amount of progress. Can you make it past all 3 regions and make it up to the surface?

Controls: Hold [SPACE] to jump, [Z] to zoom.

This game is meant to be very challenging to beat, but if you are especially having trouble or just want to beat the game in pinch, consider changing the difficulty in the options to "Baby Mode", which enables rewinds to your previous jump location by pressing [R].
